Distribution. Euro-Siberian, temperate. Throughout the Russian territory from Kaliningradskaya Oblast to Magadanskaya and Amurskaya Oblast. Outside Russia : Europe, N Kazakhstan , Mongolia .

,

,

( Gordeeva & Gordeev 2007 ; Beljaev 2016 ).
